title: Flipping the script in organic reaction mechanism instruction: using generative pedagogies instead of lecture to improve learning outcomes
content:
Chem. Educ. Res. Pract., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3RP00322A, Paper
Connor Haindfield, William Cerbin, Douglas Baumann, Heather Schenck
Two generative approaches to reaction mechanism instruction for novice students were compared to lecture instruction. In both approaches, students were coached to propose selected reaction mechanisms based on prior knowledge....
